notebook: Lateral reading: is the act of evaluating the credibility of a source by comparing it with other sources.
Cross-referencing involves comparing information from the original source with information from other sources.
Source evaluation: Look to see if someone else has already fact-checked the claim. Go to the original source to understand the trustworthiness of the information.
Dr. Green is using these two potions - Infinity, Blue color, A25, used in beauty products; Lifespring, Pink color, A21, for helping with sleep.
Dr. Green is staying here with his daughter for sabbatical. His daughter's birthday is on 09/05. It seems there is something wrong with his daughter though...

clueList.clueInfo: I have been in this room.
I have been in this room.
clueList.clueDetail: This seems to be Dr.Green's bedroom.

clueList.clueInfo: This is the third door. The door is locked.
clueList.clueDetail: I have the key to enter it.

clueList.clueInfo: This is the room I just got out from. No need to go back.
I can go upstairs through this staircase. I don't think it's safe to go there now, because I can hear people talking. I can only hear 'Dr.Green' 'immortality portion'
clueList.clueDetail: I don't think it's safe to go there now. But maybe I can find something related to this immortality portion.

hint: The noise is getting more intense. I got the key to the next door. I should go there and check it out.
